name: Don't Explode (itch) (Marcotte173)
description:
Don't Explode!

A fairly low effort affair.  Conceived and developed over 5 hours and not super bug tested.

Hope you have fun with it, I enjoyed making it

Controls - 

WASD to move. Left click to fire your bullets, which will go in the direction of your mouse.

PURPLE ENEMIES -

When purple enemies get close to you, they will explode in 3 seconds. Their white indicator will turn yellow when their countdown begins.

ORANGE ENEMIES-

Orange enemies shoot at you.  They have 3 different bullets

Black bullets - Turn your gun off for 3 seconds

Green bullets - You go faster for 3 seconds

Red bullets - You go slower for 3 seconds

ENDING  THE GAME -

The game ends when you a purple enemy makes you explode. When that happens you will be notified of your time and given a chance to try again
